SEARCH
Module OOP
Package OOPProject

Interface DoctorAppointmentManagement

public interface DoctorAppointmentManagement
Interface to manage doctor appointments. Provides methods for setting availability, accepting or declining appointments, and viewing the appointment schedule of a doctor.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    acceptAppointmentRequest(String appointmentID)
    Accepts an appointment request by its unique appointment ID.
    void
    declineAppointmentRequest(String appointmentID)
    Declines an appointment request by its unique appointment ID.
    void
    setAvailableDates(String doctorID, List<AppointmentSlot> schedule)
    Sets the available dates and times for a doctor's appointments.
    List<Appointment>
    viewAppointmentSchedule(String doctorID)
    Views the current appointment schedule for a doctor.

  • Method Details

    • setAvailableDates

      void setAvailableDates(String doctorID, List<AppointmentSlot> schedule)
      Sets the available dates and times for a doctor's appointments.
      Parameters:
      doctorID - The unique identifier of the doctor.
      schedule - A list of available appointment slots for the doctor.

    • acceptAppointmentRequest

      void acceptAppointmentRequest(String appointmentID)
      Accepts an appointment request by its unique appointment ID.
      Parameters:
      appointmentID - The unique identifier of the appointment to be accepted.

    • declineAppointmentRequest

      void declineAppointmentRequest(String appointmentID)
      Declines an appointment request by its unique appointment ID.
      Parameters:
      appointmentID - The unique identifier of the appointment to be declined.

    • viewAppointmentSchedule

      List<Appointment> viewAppointmentSchedule(String doctorID)
      Views the current appointment schedule for a doctor.
      Parameters:
      doctorID - The unique identifier of the doctor.
      Returns:
      A list of appointments scheduled for the doctor.
